sections.heading: of taxes, personal; sheriff; report
sections.text: On or before August 1 of each year, the sheriff shall report to the county board showing the total amount collected on current distress warrants and the amount remaining uncollected.SourceLaws 1943, c. 181, ยง 2, p. 628;R.S.1943, ยง 77-1719;Laws 1947, c. 259, ยง 2(2)
